info.name: Firefox: Hidden password remove buttons
info.description:
Remove the Remove buttons(Firefox IRonly).

I still can't believe that there's no confirm or alert window to cancel the remove password action AFTER press those buttonS.
(The "S" here really costs a painful Scar, trust me.)
